titles.title: A joint resolution to designate the week of June 5, 1988 through June 11, 1988, as "National Intelligence Community Week".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 3/8/1988--Introduced. Designates the week of June 5 through June 11, 1988, as National Intelligence Community Week.
